column4: I find that in 10.04 I have the su command and none of my passwords work with it.  1) Is su officially supported now?  2)  Why don't my passwords work?
How do I know how much RAM it's using?
Yeah 32 bit OS on a 64 bit CPU
on 32bit OS part of the address space is used to address devices such as the GPU
you should use a 64bit OS if you need the extra 500Mb
So what do I do?  Run in text mode?
you could have built the driver manually using dkms ;)
On boot up I get a screen saying drivers gave an error
nvidia+intel+how switching = nvidia driver not working
